hook.text: Coke is sugar water. Ingredients cost pennies. Yet it's one of the most valuable brands on Earth.

buildup.text: Coca-Cola doesn't sell a drink. It sells happiness, nostalgia, and shared moments between people.

discovery.text: Every Coke ad shows connection: friends laughing, families gathering, strangers sharing a moment.

twist.text: Blind taste tests favor Pepsi. But with labels showing, Coke wins. The brand literally changes the taste.

climax.text: Coke proves that emotion beats ingredients. When you sell a feeling, the product becomes secondary.

punchline.text: Sell the feeling. The product becomes secondary.
